TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebClient extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供用于将数据发送到由 URI 标识的资源及从这样的资源接收数据的常用方法。

span.span: Provides common methods for sending data to and receiving data from a resource identified by a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于将数据发送到或从任何本地、 intranet 或通过 URI 确认的 Internet 资源接收数据的常见方法。The class provides common methods for sending data to or receiving data from any local, intranet, or Internet resource identified by a URI. 类使用类以提供对资源的访问。The class uses the class to provide access to resources. 实例可以访问与任意数据后代注册方法。 instances can access data with any descendant registered with the method. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，.NET Framework 支持开头的 Uri `http:`， `https:`，ftp:，和`file:`方案标识符。By default, the .NET Framework supports URIs that begin with `http:`, `https:`, ftp:, and `file:` scheme identifiers. 下表描述了将数据上载到资源的方法。The following table describes methods for uploading data to a resource. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||检索用于将数据发送到资源。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource.| ||检索用于将数据发送到的资源，而不会阻止调用线程。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||发送到资源的字节数组，并返回数组，其中包含的任何响应。Sends a byte array to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||发送到资源，而不会阻止调用线程的数组。Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将本地文件发送到资源，并返回数组，其中包含的任何响应。Sends a local file to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||将本地文件发送到该资源，而不会阻止调用线程。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||发送到资源，并返回数组，其中包含的任何响应。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||发送到资源，并返回数组，包含任何响应，而不会阻止调用线程。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| ||发送到资源，而不会阻止调用线程。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||发送到资源，而不会阻止调用线程。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 下表描述了从资源下载数据的方法。The following table describes methods for downloading data from a resource. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||返回的数据从作为资源。Returns the data from a resource as a .| ||返回从资源，而不会阻止调用线程的数据。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||从资源下载数据，并返回数组。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array.| ||从资源下载数据，并返回数组，而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将数据从资源下载到本地文件。Downloads data from a resource to a local file.| ||数据从资源下载到本地文件，而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||下载资源，并返回从。Downloads a from a resource and returns a .| ||下载从资源，而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads a from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. A实例不会默认情况下发送可选的 HTTP 标头。A instance does not send optional HTTP headers by default. 如果您的请求需要一个可选的标头，则必须添加到标头集合。If your request requires an optional header, you must add the header to the collection. 例如，若要保留在响应中的查询，必须添加用户代理标头。For example, to retain queries in the response, you must add a user-agent header. 此外，服务器可能返回 500 （内部服务器错误），如果用户代理标头缺失。Also, servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the user agent header is missing. 设置为`true`中实例。 is set to `true` in instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例采用资源的 URI，检索它，并显示响应。The following code example takes the URI of a resource, retrieves it, and displays the response. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CPP/useragent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CS/useragent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/VB/useragent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数创建的新实例类。The default constructor creates a new instance of the class. 默认 HTTP 方法是 GET。The default HTTP method is GET. 默认 FTP 方法是时重试。The default FTP method is RETR. 默认的 为 。The default is . 的默认值为 `true`。The default value of is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建实例，然后使用它来从服务器下载数据，并将其显示在系统控制台上，从服务器下载数据，并将其写入到文件，并将上载到服务器的格式值和接收响应。The following code example creates a instance and then uses it to download data from a server and display it on the system console, to download data from a server and write it to a file, and to upload form values to a server and receive the response. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对从某一 实例的 Internet 资源读取的数据进行缓冲处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data read from the Internet resource for a instance.

value.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

value.span: 如果为 ，则启用对从 Internet 资源接收的数据进行缓冲处理；如果为 ，则禁用缓冲处理。

span.span: to enable buffering of the data received from the Internet resource; to disable buffering.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，以便随时可由应用程序读取数据缓冲在内存中。When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it is ready to be read by the app.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否对写入到 实例的 Internet 资源的数据进行缓冲处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data written to the Internet resource for a instance.

value.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

value.span: 允许对写入到 Internet 资源的数据进行缓冲处理； 禁用缓冲处理。

span.span: to enable buffering of the data written to the Internet resource; to disable buffering.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，因此，可以对较大数据块中的 Internet 资源更有效地编写数据缓冲在内存中。When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it can be written more efficiently to the Internet resource in larger chunks.

summary.span: 获取或设置 发出请求的基 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI for requests made by a .

value.span: ，包含 请求的基 URI；如果尚未指定基地址，则为 。

span.span: A containing the base URI for requests made by a or if no base address has been specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个组合的相对地址的基本 URI。The property contains a base URI that is combined with a relative address. 当调用的方法，上载或下载数据，对象将与你在方法调用中指定的相对地址组合此基 URI。When you call a method that uploads or downloads data, the object combines this base URI with the relative address you specify in the method call. 如果指定一个绝对 URI，不使用属性值。If you specify an absolute URI, does not use the property value. 若要移除以前设置值时，请将此属性设置为`null`或空字符串 ("")。To remove a previously set value, set this property to `null` or an empty string (""). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从 Internet 服务器下载数据，并将其显示在控制台上。The following code example downloads data from an Internet server and displays it on the console. 它假定服务器的地址 (如http://www.contoso.com)处于`hostUri`以及资源 （例如 /default.htm) 的路径是否在`uriSuffix`。It assumes that the server's address (such as http://www.contoso.com) is in `hostUri` and that the path to the resource (such as /default.htm) is in `uriSuffix`. [!code-cpp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CPP/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CS/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/VB/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消一个挂起的异步操作。

span.span: Cancels a pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果操作处于挂起状态，此方法调用基础。If an operation is pending, this method calls on the underlying . 当调用，你的应用程序仍然会收到与操作关联的完成事件。When you call , your application still receives the completion event associated with the operation. 例如，当调用取消操作，但如果你指定的事件处理程序事件，事件处理程序接收通知，该操作已结束。For example, when you call to cancel a operation, if you have specified an event handler for the event, your event handler receives notification that the operation has ended. 若要了解是否已成功完成该操作，请检查属性上的基本类在事件数据对象传递给事件处理程序。To learn whether the operation completed successfully, check the property on the base class of in the event data object passed to the event handler. 如果正在无异步操作，则此方法任何影响。If no asynchronous operation is in progress, this method does nothing.

summary.span: 获取或设置发送到主机并用于对请求进行身份验证的网络凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the network credentials that are sent to the host and used to authenticate the request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含该请求的身份验证凭据。

span.span: An containing the authentication credentials for the request.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于访问主机上的资源的身份验证凭据。The property contains the authentication credentials used to access a resource on a host. 在大多数客户端的情况下，应使用，这是当前登录用户的凭据。In most client-side scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性`true`而不是设置此属性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. 如果类正在使用在中间层应用程序，如 ASP.NET 应用程序，属于运行 ASP 页面 （服务器端凭据） 的帐户。If the class is being used in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET application, the belong to the account running the ASP page (the server-side credentials). 通常情况下，将此属性设置为客户端的名义发出的请求的凭据。Typically, you would set this property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 出于安全原因，自动遵循重定向时，你想要包含在中的重定向将凭据存储并将其分配给此属性。For security reasons, when automatically following redirects, store the credentials that you want to be included in the redirect in a and assign it to this property. 此属性将自动设置为`null`在重定向，如果它包含除。This property will automatically be set to `null` upon redirection if it contains anything except a . 具有此属性的值自动设置为`null`在这些情况下防止凭据被发送到任何非预期目标。Having this property value be automatically set to `null` under those conditions prevents credentials from being sent to any unintended destination. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用用户的系统凭据进行身份验证请求。The following code example uses the user's system credentials to authenticate a request. [!code-cpp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CPP/webclientauth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CS/webclientauth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/VB/webclientauth.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从指定 URI 下载资源作为 数组。

span.span: Downloads the resource as a array from the URI specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] DownloadData (string address);
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] DownloadData(string address) cil managed
Public Function DownloadData (address As String) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ DownloadData(System::String ^ address);

param.name: address
param.span: 从中下载数据的 URI。

span.span: The URI from which to download data.

summary.span: 从指定 URI 下载资源作为 数组。

span.span: Downloads the resource as a array from the URI specified.

returns.span: 一个 数组，其中包含下载的资源。

span.span: A array containing the downloaded resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法下载指定的 URI 资源`address`参数。The method downloads the resource with the URI specified by the `address` parameter. 下载资源时此方法阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并继续执行等待服务器的响应时，使用之一方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从服务器请求数据，并显示返回的数据。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假定`remoteUri`包含所请求数据的是有效的 URI。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data. [!code-cpp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CPP/webclient_downloaddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CS/webclient_downloaddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/VB/webclient_downloaddata.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法下载指定的 URI 资源`address`参数。The method downloads the resource with the URI specified by the `address` parameter. 下载资源时此方法阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并继续执行等待服务器的响应时，使用之一方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. **请注意**时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 从指定 URI 中将资源作为 数组下载以作为异步操作。

span.span: Downloads the resource as a array from the URI specified as an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索指定的资源中指定的 URI 方案与关联的协议中使用的默认方法`address`。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源异步下载数据。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 下载资源时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要在等待服务器的响应时下载的资源和块，使用之一方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 下载完成后，引发事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 你的应用程序必须处理此事件以接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 下载的数据位于属性。The downloaded data is available in the property. 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索指定的资源中指定的 URI 方案与关联的协议中使用的默认方法`address`。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源异步下载数据。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 下载资源时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要在等待服务器的响应时下载的资源和块，使用之一方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 下载完成后，引发事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 你的应用程序必须处理此事件以接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 下载的数据位于属性。The downloaded data is available in the property. 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后已下载的数据资源。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 此方法检索指定的资源中指定的 URI 方案与关联的协议中使用的默认方法`address`参数。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in the `address` parameter. 使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源异步下载数据。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 下面的代码示例从服务器请求数据，并显示返回的数据。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假定`remoteUri`包含所请求数据的是有效的 URI。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data.

span.span: Downloads the resource with the specified URI to a local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将下载到本地文件数据的方法从 URI 中指定的`address`参数。The method downloads to a local file data from the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载资源时此方法阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并继续执行等待服务器的响应时，使用之一方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在中间层应用程序，如 ASP.NET 页中，使用此方法时将收到错误，如果应用程序在其下执行的帐户没有权限访问该文件。When using this method in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account under which the application executes does not have permission to access the file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例下载文件从http://www.contoso.com到本地硬盘。The following code example downloads a file from http://www.contoso.com to the local hard drive. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将在指定的 URI 处的资源下载`address`参数。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载的文件下载成功完成时，名为`fileName`本地计算机上。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式将下载文件。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，文件可用时，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the file is available, add an event handler to the event. 资源，在下载时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the resource is being downloaded. 若要阻止等待下载完成时，请使用之一方法。To block while waiting for the download to complete, use one of the methods. 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`未指定一个绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 使用此方法时在 ASP.NET 页中，将收到错误，如果页中执行的帐户没有权限访问该本地文件。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将在指定的 URI 处的资源下载`address`参数。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载的文件下载成功完成时，名为`fileName`本地计算机上。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式将下载文件。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，文件可用时，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the file is available, add an event handler to the event. 资源，在下载时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the resource is being downloaded. 若要阻止等待下载完成时，请使用之一方法。To block while waiting for the download to complete, use one of the methods. 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`未指定一个绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 使用此方法时在 ASP.NET 页中，将收到错误，如果页中执行的帐户没有权限访问该本地文件。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步文件下载操作完成后，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file download operation completes. 通过调用启动的异步文件下载方法。Asynchronous file downloads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后已下载的数据资源。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 此方法将在指定的 URI 处的资源下载`address`参数。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下载的文件下载成功完成时，名为`fileName`本地计算机上。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式将下载文件。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`未指定一个绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 使用此方法时在 ASP.NET 页中，将收到错误，如果页中执行的帐户没有权限访问该本地文件。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

summary.span: 在异步下载操作成功传输部分或全部数据后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous download operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步下载工作的进展，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous download makes progress. 使用任何以下方法启动下载时，引发此事件。This event is raised when downloads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||从资源下载数据，并返回数组，而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||数据从资源下载到本地文件，而不会阻止调用线程。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||返回从资源，而不会阻止调用线程的数据。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 被动 FTP 文件传输将始终显示进度百分比均为零，因为服务器未发送的文件大小。A passive FTP file transfer will always show a progress percentage of zero, since the server did not send the file size. 若要显示进度，你可以更改 FTP 连接为活动通过重写虚拟方法：To show progress, you can change the FTP connection to active by overriding the virtual method: ```csharp internal class MyWebClient : WebClient { protected override WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri address) { FtpWebRequest req = (FtpWebRequest)base.GetWebRequest(address); req.UsePassive = false; return req; } } ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#19)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#19)] 下面的代码示例演示此事件的处理程序的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索指定的资源。This method retrieves the specified resource. 下载该资源后，该方法使用中指定的编码属性要转换到资源。After it downloads the resource, the method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 下载资源时此方法阻止。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下载资源并继续执行等待服务器的响应时，使用之一方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源是以异步方式从线程池使用自动分配的线程资源下载的。The resource is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 下载该资源之后, 此方法使用中指定的编码属性要转换到资源。After downloading the resource, this method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 下载资源时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要在等待服务器的响应时下载的资源和块，使用方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use the method. 下载完成后，引发事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 你的应用程序必须处理此事件以接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 已下载的字符串可用于属性。The downloaded string is available in the property. 你可以使用方法来取消未完成的异步操作。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置与请求关联的标头名称/值对集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.

value.span: 一个 ，包含与此请求关联的标头名称/值对。

span.span: A containing header name/value pairs associated with this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含实例，包含的协议标头，随请求发送。The property contains a instance containing protocol headers that the sends with the request. 一些常见标头限制和保护的系统，无法设置或更改在被视为对象。Some common headers are considered restricted and are protected by the system and cannot be set or changed in a object. 任何尝试设置在这些受限制的标头之一与关联的对象尝试发送时，对象将引发异常更高版本请求。Any attempt to set one of these restricted headers in the object associated with a object will throw an exception later when attempting to send the request. 受系统的受限的标头包括但不限于以下：Restricted headers protected by the system include, but are not limited to the following: - 日期Date - HostHost 此外，某些其他标头也会受到限制时使用对象。In addition, some other headers are also restricted when using a object. 这些限制的标头包括，但不限于下面：These restricted headers include, but are not limited to the following: - 接受Accept - 连接Connection - 内容长度Content-Length - 预期 (当将值设置为"100-继续"Expect (when the value is set to "100-continue" - 如果-修改-自If-Modified-Since - 范围Range - 传输编码Transfer-Encoding 类具有用于将某些上述标头设置属性。The class has properties for setting some of the above headers. 如果它很重要的应用程序设置这些标头，则类应使用而不是类。If it is important for an application to set these headers, then the class should be used instead of the class. 不应假定，标头值将保持不变，因为 Web 服务器和缓存可能更改或添加到 Web 请求的标头。You should not assume that the header values will remain unchanged, because Web servers and caches may change or add headers to a Web request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用集合来设置 HTTP`Content-Type`标头到`application/x-www-form-urlencoded,`通知窗体中数据的服务器连接到发布。The following code example uses the collection to set the HTTP `Content-Type` header to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded,` to notify the server that form data is attached to the post. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CPP/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CS/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/VB/webclient_uploaddata_headers.vb#2)]

[!code-cpp[NCLCustomWebClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCustomWebClient/CPP/mywebclient.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLCustomWebClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCustomWebClient/CS/mywebclient.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream OpenRead (string address);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream OpenRead(string address) cil managed
Public Function OpenRead (address As String) As Stream
public: System::IO::Stream ^ OpenRead(System::String ^ address);

param.name: address
param.span: 以 形式指定的 URI，将从中下载数据。

span.span: The URI specified as a from which to download data.

summary.span: 为从具有 指定的 URI 的资源下载的数据打开一个可读的流。

span.span: Opens a readable stream for the data downloaded from a resource with the URI specified as a .

returns.span: 一个 ，用于从资源读取数据。

span.span: A used to read data from a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建用来读取指定的资源的内容实例`address`参数。The method creates a instance used to read the contents of the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 此方法在打开的流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要继续等待流时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不是`null`，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用时已完成，但以避免系统资源不足。You must call when finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开所标识的资源`uriString`并在系统控制台上显示结果。The following code example opens the resource identified by `uriString` and displays the results on the system console. 请注意，返回读取数据时已关闭。Note that the returned by is closed when the data has been read. [!code-cpp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CPP/webclient_openread.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CS/webclient_openread.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/VB/webclient_openread.vb#1)]

exception.span: 参数为 。

exception.span: 通过组合 和 所构成的 URI 无效。

span.span: The URI formed by combining , is invalid.

exception.span: - 或 - 下载数据时出现错误。

span.span: -or- An error occurred while downloading data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建用来读取指定的资源的内容实例`address`参数。The method creates a instance used to read the contents of the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 此方法在打开的流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要继续等待流时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不是`null`，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用时已完成，但以避免系统资源不足。You must call when finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. **请注意**时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索用来访问指定的资源实例`address`参数。This method retrieves a instance used to access the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 流是使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源获取的。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，流可用时，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用与完成之后以避免系统资源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 打开流时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 若要阻止等待流时，请使用方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use the method. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`未指定一个绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI构成请求的资源的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested resource. 如果属性不是`null`，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用 RETR 命令来下载 FTP 资源。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个可写流，用于将数据发送到资源。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 此方法在打开的流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要继续等待流时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从命令行读取数据，并使用以获取一个流以便写入数据。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream for writing the data. 请注意，返回之后将数据发送关闭。Note that the returned by is closed after the data is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个可写流，用于将数据发送到资源。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 使用中指定的方法进行基础请求`method`参数。The underlying request is made with the method specified in the `method` parameter. 当关闭流时，将向服务器发送数据。The data is sent to the server when you close the stream. 此方法在打开的流时阻止。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要继续等待流时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果`method`参数指定不理解服务器，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况的方法。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`未指定一个绝对地址，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute address, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从命令行读取数据，并使用以获取用于将数据写入流。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream used to write the data. 请注意，返回要发送的数据必须关闭。Note that the returned by must be closed to send the data. [!code-cpp[WebClient_OpenWrite#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenWrite/CPP/webclient_openwrite.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_OpenWrite#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenWrite/CS/webclient_openwrite.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_OpenWrite#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenWrite/VB/webclient_openwrite.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索用于将数据发送到资源的可写流。This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 该流被检索使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源。The stream is retrieved using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，流可用时，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. 当关闭流时，线程阻止，直至请求发送到`address`和收到的响应。When you close the stream, the thread blocks until the request is sent to `address` and a response is received. 正在打开的流时，此方法不会不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened. 若要阻止等待流时，请使用之一方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索用于将数据发送到资源的可写流。This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 该流是使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式检索的。The stream is retrieved asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，流可用时，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. 流的内容发送到服务器时关闭的流。The contents of the stream are sent to the server when you close the stream. 如果`method`参数指定不理解服务器，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况的方法。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 正在打开的流时，此方法不会不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened. 若要阻止等待流时，请使用之一方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次完成一个异步操作以打开一个流，它用于将数据发送到资源时，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation to open a stream that is used to send data to a resource completes. 这些操作由调用启动方法。These operations are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#14)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后数据资源的可写流已打开。The returned object will complete after the a writable stream to the data resource has been opened. 打开流时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 此方法检索用来将数据写入到指定的资源实例`address`参数。This method retrieves a instance used to write data to the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 流是使用从线程池自动分配的线程资源获取的。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用与完成之后以避免系统资源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 如果`method`参数指定不理解服务器，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况的方法。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可发送到资源数据缓冲区。The method sends a data buffer to a resource. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 如果服务器不理解基础的请求，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 方法可发送的内容`data`到服务器而无需对其进行编码。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 此方法在将数据上载时阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要继续等待服务器的响应时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将从控制台到输入字符串转换数组，该数组发送到指定的服务器使用。The following code example converts a string entered from the console to a array and posts the array to the specified server using . 从服务器的任何响应将显示到控制台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CPP/webclient_uploaddata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CS/webclient_uploaddata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/VB/webclient_uploaddata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可发送到使用中指定的 HTTP 方法的资源的数据缓冲区`method`参数，并从服务器返回任何响应。The method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server. 此方法在将数据上载时阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要继续等待服务器的响应时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 方法可发送的内容`data`到服务器而无需对其进行编码。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 如果`method`参数指定的谓词不理解服务器，则基础协议类将确定所发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将字符串从控制台输入到字节数组转换并发布到指定的服务器使用的数组。The following code example converts a string entered from the console into a byte array and posts the array to the specified server using . 从服务器的任何响应将显示到控制台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可发送到使用中指定的 HTTP 方法的资源的数据缓冲区`method`参数，并从服务器返回任何响应。The method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server. 此方法在将数据上载时阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要继续等待服务器的响应时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 方法可发送的内容`data`到服务器而无需对其进行编码。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 如果`method`参数指定的谓词不理解服务器，则基础协议类将确定所发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可发送到资源数据缓冲区。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送的数据缓冲区。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未编码数据。The data is not encoded. 若要在数据上载完成时接收通知，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the data upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 正在发送数据时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the data is being sent. 若要在等待服务器的响应中发送数据和块，使用之一方法。To send data and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("")，和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在异步数据上载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous data-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步数据上载操作完成后，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous data upload operation completes. 通过调用启动异步数据上载方法。Asynchronous data uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后数据缓冲区已上载到该资源。The returned object will complete after the a data buffer has been uploaded to the resource. 此方法可发送到资源数据缓冲区。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送的数据缓冲区。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未编码数据。The data is not encoded. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("")，和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将本地文件发送到资源。The method sends a local file to a resource. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 上载文件时此方法阻止。This method blocks while uploading the file. 若要继续等待服务器的响应时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. `POST`方法定义的 HTTP。The `POST` method is defined by HTTP. 如果基础的请求不使用 HTTP 和`POST`不理解服务器，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the underlying request does not use HTTP and `POST` is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将指定的文件上载到指定的 URI 使用。The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using . 服务器返回任何响应将显示在控制台上。Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/CPP/webclient_uploadfile.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/CS/webclient_uploadfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadFile/VB/webclient_uploadfile.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例显示 ASP.NET 页可以接受发送的文件，以及是适用于方法。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that can accept posted files and is suitable for use with the method. 页面必须驻留在 Web 服务器上。The page must reside on a Web server. 其地址提供的值`address`参数方法。Its address provides the value for the `address` parameter of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当地址指定 HTTP 资源时，方法将本地文件发送到资源中指定的 HTTP 方法`method`参数，并从服务器返回任何响应。When address specifies an HTTP resource, the method sends a local file to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter and returns any response from the server. 上载文件时此方法阻止。This method blocks while uploading the file. 若要继续等待服务器的响应时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果`method`参数指定服务器不理解的谓词或`address`资源，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server or the `address` resource, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将指定的文件上载到指定的 URI 使用。The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using . 服务器返回任何响应将显示在控制台上。Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console. span.span: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

summary.span: 使用 POST 方法将指定的本地文件上载到指定的资源。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the POST method.

summary.span: 此方法不会阻止调用线程。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送文件。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在文件上载完成时接收通知，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 当正在发送文件时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent. 若要在等待服务器的响应中发送的文件和块，使用之一方法。To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("")，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

Public Custom Event UploadFileCompleted As UploadFileCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Net::UploadFileCompletedEventHandler ^ UploadFileCompleted;

summary.span: 在异步文件上载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous file-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步文件上载操作完成后，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file upload operation completes. 通过调用启动异步文件上载方法。Asynchronous file uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后该文件已上载到该资源。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送文件。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("")，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<unsigned int8[]> UploadFileTaskAsync(class System.Uri address, string method, string fileName) cil managed
Public Function UploadFileTaskAsync (address As Uri, method As String, fileName As String) As Task(Of Byte())
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ UploadFileTaskAsync(Uri ^ address, System::String ^ method, System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: address
param.span: 接收文件的资源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the file.

param.span: 对于 HTTP 资源，此 URI 必须标识可以接受用 POST 方法发送的请求的资源，如脚本或 ASP 页。

span.span: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

param.name: method
param.span: 用于将数据发送到资源的方法。

span.span: The method used to send the data to the resource.

param.span: 如果为 ，则对于 http 默认值为 POST，对于 ftp 默认值为 STOR。

span.span: If , the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要发送到资源的本地文件。

span.span: The local file to send to the resource.

summary.span: 使用任务对象将指定本地文件上载到资源以作为异步操作。

span.span: Uploads the specified local file to a resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

returns.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性将返回 数组，该数组包含在上载文件时从资源接收的响应的正文。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the file was uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后该文件已上载到该资源。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送文件。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("")，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 默认情况下，此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。BY default, this method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

.event class System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler UploadProgressChanged
Public Custom Event UploadProgressChanged As UploadProgressChangedEventHandler
public: event System::Net::UploadProgressChangedEventHandler ^ UploadProgressChanged;

summary.span: 在异步上载操作成功转换部分或全部数据后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous upload operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步上载工作的进展，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload makes progress. 使用任何以下方法启动上载时，引发此事件。This event is raised when uploads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||发送到资源，而不会阻止调用线程的数组。Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||将本地文件发送到该资源，而不会阻止调用线程。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||发送到资源，并返回数组，包含任何响应，而不会阻止调用线程。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示此事件的处理程序的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#42)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#42)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#42)]

returns.span: 一个 ，包含服务器发送的响应。

span.span: A containing the response sent by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上载之前字符串，此方法将其转换为数组中指定的编码使用属性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 此方法将一直阻塞传输字符串时。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 若要发送字符串，并继续执行等待服务器的响应时，使用之一方法。To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("")，和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将字符串发送到的资源。This method sends a string to a resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送字符串。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 上载之前字符串，此方法将其转换为数组中指定的编码使用属性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 若要在字符串上载完成时接收通知，你可以添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 正在发送字符串时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等待服务器的响应中发送字符串和块，使用之一方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

Public Sub UploadStringAsync (address As Uri, method As String, data As String)
public: void UploadStringAsync(Uri ^ address, System::String ^ method, System::String ^ data);

param.name: address
param.span: 要接收字符串的资源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the resource to receive the string.

param.span: 对于 HTTP 资源，此 URI 必须标识可以接受用 POST 方法发送的请求的资源，如脚本或 ASP 页。

span.span: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.

param.name: method
param.span: 用于将文件发送到资源的 HTTP 方法。

span.span: The HTTP method used to send the file to the resource.

param.span: 如果为 null，则对于 http 默认值为 POST，对于 ftp 默认值为 STOR。

span.span: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

param.name: data
param.span: 要上载的字符串。

span.span: The string to be uploaded.

summary.span: 在异步字符串上载操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous string-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次异步字符串上载操作完成后，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous string upload operation completes. 通过调用启动异步字符串上载方法。Asynchronous string uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置事件处理程序为此事件。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后字符串已上载到该资源。The returned object will complete after the string has been uploaded to the resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送字符串。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 上载之前字符串，此方法将其转换为数组中指定的编码使用属性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 此方法将一直阻塞传输字符串时。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
