remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后字符串已上载到该资源。The returned object will complete after the string has been uploaded to the resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送字符串。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 上载之前字符串，此方法将其转换为数组中指定的编码使用属性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 此方法将一直阻塞传输字符串时。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法发送到服务器。The method sends a to a server. 此方法在将数据上载时阻止。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要继续等待服务器的响应时执行，请使用之一方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果服务器不理解基础的请求，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果内容类型标头`null`、方法将其设置为"应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, the method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从用户 （名称、 年龄和地址） 收集的信息和这些值发送到服务器使用。The following code example gathers information from the user (name, age, and address) and posts the values to the server using . 从服务器的任何响应将显示在控制台上。Any response from the server is displayed on the console. span.span: Uploads the data in the specified name/value collection to the resource identified by the specified URI, using the specified method.

summary.span: 此方法不会阻止调用线程。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可发送中包含的数据到`address`资源。This method sends the data contained in a to the `address` resource. 使用此方法将窗体数据发送到 URI 进行处理。Use this method to send form data to a URI for processing. 使用窗体编码形式媒体类型; 发送数据内容类型标头值必须设置为"应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded"。The data is sent using the form-urlencoded media type; the Content-Type header value must be set to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 默认情况下正确设置了标题。The header is set correctly by default. 方法将引发如果调用此方法具有不同内容类型标头值集在集合。The methods throw a if you call this method with a different Content-Type header value set in the collection. 如果`method`方法不理解的服务器，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the `method` method is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 使用线程池自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送。The is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要在上载操作完成时接收通知，将添加到事件处理程序事件。To receive notification when the upload operation completes, add an event handler to the event. 正在发送字符串时，此方法不会阻止调用线程。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等待服务器的响应中发送字符串和块，使用之一方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not empty, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在名称/值集合的异步上载完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous upload of a name/value collection completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将引发此事件每次的异步上载对象的数据完成。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload of a object's data completes. 通过调用启动这些上载方法。These uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

span.span: Uploads the specified name/value collection to the resource identified by the specified URI as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

span.span: Uploads the specified name/value collection to the resource identified by the specified URI as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

returns.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性将返回包含服务器发送的响应的 数组。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a array containing the response sent by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后已上载到该资源的名称/值集合。The returned object will complete after the name/value collection has been uploaded to the resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送的名称/值集合。The name/value collection is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果服务器不理解基础的请求，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果内容类型标头`null`，此方法将其设置为"应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, this method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后已上载到该资源的名称/值集合。The returned object will complete after the name/value collection has been uploaded to the resource. 使用在线程池中自动分配的线程资源以异步方式发送的名称/值集合。The name/value collection is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 可以使用取消未完成的异步操作方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果服务器不理解基础的请求，则基础协议类确定所发生的情况。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常情况下，引发与属性设置，以指示错误。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果内容类型标头`null`，此方法将其设置为"应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, this method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果属性不为空字符串 ("") 和`address`不包含绝对 URI，`address`必须与结合使用是相对 URI以形成所请求的数据的绝对 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果属性不为空字符串，则会附加到`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法使用存储命令上载 FTP 资源。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 对于 HTTP 资源时，将使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the are sent with requests.

span.span: if the default credentials are used; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`时发出的此请求对象，如果请求服务器进行身份验证应使用当前登录用户的默认凭据。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the default credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序，这是在大多数情况下所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序，例如 ASP.NET 应用程序，而不是使用此属性，通常会设置到客户端的名义发出的请求的凭据的属性。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在使用写入流将数据写入资源的异步操作结束时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous operation to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次关闭用于将数据写入到的资源使用写入流的异步操作，将引发此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation used to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed. 这些操作因调用方法。These operations result from calls to the methods. 是此事件的委托。The is the delegate for this event. 类提供与事件数据的事件处理程序。The class provides the event handler with event data. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
